arts.ttl: Largie Ramazani sends short but fitting Leeds United message after huge promotion boost
arts.sum: Leeds United winger Largie Ramazani has been a big topic of discussion recently due to his lack of playing time, but his side getting over the line is the only thing that matters right now. Leeds United and Ramazani fighting through the suffering to bring glory of promotion

arts.ttl: Manor Solomon resurgence and Daniel Farke message allows Leeds diehards to dream
arts.sum: And with the Sheffield United result, Leeds are now in a hugely commanding position with just four games to go. If the Blades lose to Cardiff City on Good Friday and Leeds win their next two matches - Oxford United away and Stoke City at home - the Whites are, say it quietly, Premier League.

arts.ttl: Weston McKennie among 13 footballers probed for illegal gambling in Italy
arts.sum: Weston McKennie and 12 others are under investigation for illegal betting in Italy. The probe follows revelations from Sandro Tonali and Nicolò Fagioli, who faced bans for gambling. No evidence links others to match bets, but fines may follow for online poker use.

arts.ttl: Leeds back on top of Championship after beating Preston
arts.sum: Manor Solomon scored one goal and created another for Jayden Bogle as Leeds deservedly beat Preston 2-1 to return to the Championship summit.

arts.ttl: Leeds see off Preston to return to the top of the Championship
Bogle puts Leeds back on top with crucial winner over Preston
arts.sum: Leeds moved back to the summit of the Championship after Jayden Bogle’s 13th-minute goal proved the difference against a dogged Preston. Burnley’s victory over Norwich on Friday knocked Leeds off the top but the full-back’s sixth goal of the season made sure that state of affairs was only temporary. The home side made hard work of it, wasting a stream of chances to make for an unnecessarily stressful conclusion but iafter six minutes of stressful added time it was job done. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Leeds United team news vs Preston North End as Daniel Farke makes Wilfried Gnonto call
arts.sum: Starting XI: Darlow; Bogle; Rodon, Ampadu, Firpo; Tanaka, Gruev; Gnonto; Aaronson, Solomon; Piroe. James is out of today's game with a hamstring injury, having been forced off in the second half against Middlesbrough on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: How to watch Leeds United vs Preston - TV channel, live stream details, kick-off time - Leeds Live
arts.sum: Leeds welcome Preston North End on Saturday (12.30pm kick-off) at the same time as Sheffield United's trip to Plymouth Argyle. Unlike last week against Luton, the game isn't Sky Sports' main lunchtime game with Sheffield United's trip to Plymouth Argyle live on Sky Sports Main Event and Sky Sports Football.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke has hinted at Bamford game time plan ahead of poignant Leeds match
arts.sum: Daniel James is out of today’s match with a hamstring injury and Daniel Farke says it will be a tight race to get him up to speed for the games against Oxford United and Stoke City over the long Easter weekend. Not only going top, but Tuesday saw Leeds record their first away win since that triumph over Sheffield United and their first away clean sheet since Watford in February.

arts.ttl: Leeds United News: AI predicts where Leeds will be in 2030
arts.sum: The 49ers took over Leeds with a view to having the club established in the Premier League, set back by the fact that they completed their buyout from Andrea Radrizzani with the Whites relegated to the Championship. Leeds United’s long-term future hangs in the balance with five regular Championship games remaining and the Whites top of the league, looking for promotion right now.
